DOC.brief_summary: This randomized trial compare rate ongoing pregnancy , safety/side effect acceptability two medical abortion regimens commonly use Latin America . The first regimen involve three 800 mcg dos misoprostol take buccally three hour interval ; second involve three 800 mcg dos misoprostol take sublingually three hour interval . This study also aim assess feasibility acceptability semi-quantitative pregnancy test ( SQPT ) at-home follow-up setting .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Two Regimens Misoprostol Alone Early Pregnancy Termination Use SQPT At-Home Follow-Up
DOC.criteria: Presents voluntary termination pregnancy Gestational age â‰¤ 70 day last menstrual period plus clinical assessment ultrasound General good health include absence condition contraindicate use misoprostol pregnancy termination Agrees return followup visit willing provide address and/or telephone number purpose followup Able consent study participation Gestational age > 70 day last menstrual period Confirmed suspect ectopic molar pregnancy Contraindications medical abortion include intrauterine device place history allergy misoprostol prostaglandin
